0.title: Adult Dosing
0.mono:
• Dandruff: apply 5-10 mL TOPICALLY twice weekly for 2 weeks, then 1-4 times per month, as needed; leave on for 2-3 min, then rinse thoroughly
  • Pityriasis versicolor: apply TOPICALLY once daily for 7 days to affected area(s), lather, leave on for 10 min, then rinse body thoroughly in shower
  • Seborrheic dermatitis of scalp: apply 5-10 mL TOPICALLY twice weekly for 2 weeks, then 1-4 times per month, as needed; leave on for 2-3 min, then rinse thoroughly

1.title: Pediatric Dosing
1.mono: safety and efficacy have not been established in infants and children

3.title: Indications
3.mono:
FDA-Labeled Indications
  • Dandruff
  • Pityriasis versicolor
  • Seborrheic dermatitis of scalp
Non-FDA Labeled Indications
Tinea capitis; Adjunct

sub.title: Contraindications
sub.mono:
• hypersensitivity to selenium sulfide or any of its components
  • inflamed or exudative areas or extensive areas of skin

sub.title: Precautions
sub.mono:
• avoid contact with eyes
  • do not use for tinea versicolor during pregnancy
  • rinse hair and skin thoroughly after use; discontinue use if sensitivity reactions occur

sub.title: Breast Feeding
sub.mono:
• WHO: Compatible with breastfeeding.
  • Micromedex: Infant risk is minimal.

7.title: Mechanism Of Action
7.mono: Topical: Selenium sulfide may act by an antimitotic action, resulting in a reduction in the turnover of epidermal cells. It also has local irritant, antibacterial, and mild antifungal activity, which may contribute to its effectiveness.

9.title: Administration
9.mono:
Topical
do not use on broken skin or inflamed areas; avoid contact with eyes, genital areas, skin folds

10.title: Monitoring
10.mono:
• improved seborrhea
  • reduced excess scaling in patients with dandruff
  • improved tinea versicolor

11.title: How Supplied
11.mono:
• Generic
    • Topical Lotion: 2.5 %
    • Topical Shampoo: 1 %, 2.25 %
  • Dandrex
    Topical Shampoo: 1 %
  • Rite Aid Dandruff
    Topical Shampoo: 1 %
  • Rite Aid Renewal Dandruff Shampoo
    Topical Shampoo: 1 %
  • SelRx
    Topical Shampoo: 2.3 %
  • Selsun Blue Medicated Treatment
    Topical Shampoo: 1 %
  • Tersi Foam
    Topical Foam: 2.25 %

13.title: Clinical Teaching
13.mono:
• This drug may cause alopecia, transient contact dermatitis, greasy hair, hair discoloration, or skin irritation.
  • Instruct patient on proper application technique.
  • Patient should avoid contact with broken skin, inflamed areas, eyes, genital areas, or skin folds.
